code: import{format}from'date-fns';export var convertToDateTimeString=function convertToDateTimeString(epoch){if(!epoch){return' -- ';}return format(epoch,'E, MMM d, yyyy, h:mm a');};export var convertToDateString=function convertToDateString(epoch){if(!epoch){return' -- ';}return format(epoch,'E, MMM d, yyyy');};export var convertToDateTimeShort=function convertToDateTimeShort(epoch){if(!epoch){return' -- ';}return format(epoch,'M/d/yyyy, h:mm a');};export var convertToDateShort=function convertToDateShort(epoch){if(!epoch){return' -- ';}return format(epoch,'M/d/yyyy');};export var convertToTime=function convertToTime(epoch){if(!epoch){return' -- ';}return format(epoch,'h:mm a');};export var objectOfBoolsToArray=function objectOfBoolsToArray(object){if(!object){return[];}var arrayToReturn=[];for(var _key in object){if(object[_key]){arrayToReturn.push(_key);}}return arrayToReturn;};
